title: Autologous cell therapy market forecast to reach $44.55b by 2033
summary: The global autologous cell therapy market—therapies derived from a patient’s own cells to treat disease—is projected to grow significantly, reaching approximately USD 44.55 billion by 2033, according to a new market research report. This expansion, led by firms such as BrainStorm Cell Therapeutics, reflects rising demand for personalised cell‑based treatments that minimise immune rejection and improve therapeutic […] The post Autologous cell therapy market forecast to reach $44.55b by 2033 appeared first on Longevity.Technology.
author: LT Staff
